channel.title: EUNIS Database v2
channel.description: EUNIS Database v2 is the next version of EUNIS Database (the current version is available at http://eunis.eea.europa.eu).

item.title: EUNIS Tools
item.description: EUNIS Tools were updated to support this release (Installation kit, Database Tool, XLIFF Multilanguage Tool etc.)
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: EUNIS documentation
item.description: The EUNIS 2 documentation was updated for this release
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency
